billEvents.eventText: referred to tourism, arts and sports development

title: Requires operators of sports arenas or facilities to equip all arenas or facilities used for collegiate or professional hockey with protective netting for spectators
summary: Requires operators of sports arenas or facilities to equip all arenas or facilities used for collegiate or professional hockey with protective netting for spectators.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1388

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. ORTIZ, AUBRY, COOK, MILLMAN, J. RIVERA, ROBINSON,
         WRIGHT  --  read once and referred to the Committee on Tourism, Parks,
         Arts and Sports Development

       AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in  relation  to  requiring
         the use of protective nets at sports arenas or facilities

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Article 9 of the general  obligations  law  is  amended  by
    2  adding a new title 2 to read as follows:
    3                                    TITLE 2
    4                             PROTECTIVE NETTING
    5  SECTION 9-201. DUTIES OF OPERATORS OF SPORTS ARENAS OR FACILITIES.
    6    S  9-201. DUTIES OF OPERATORS OF SPORTS ARENAS OR FACILITIES. IT SHALL
    7  BE THE DUTY OF ANY OPERATOR OF A SPORTS ARENA OR FACILITY TO  EQUIP  ALL
    8  ARENAS  OR  FACILITIES  USED  FOR COLLEGIATE OR PROFESSIONAL HOCKEY WITH
    9  PROTECTIVE NETTING TO PROTECT SPECTATORS IN THE  STANDS  FROM  ANY  PUCK
   10  THAT  MAY  FLY  INTO  THE STANDS. THE PROTECTIVE NETTING SHALL BE PLACED
   11  OVER THE STANDS AND BE OF A HEIGHT  AND  MATERIAL  ADEQUATE  TO  PROVIDE
   12  PROTECTION TO SUCH SPECTATORS.
   13    S  2.  This  act  shall take effect on the sixtieth day after it shall
   14  have become a law.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04022-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to requiring the use of protective nets at sports arenas or facilities
